name: Edmonton.py
body:
## Welcome to the Edmonton Python Meetup Group
Our next meeting is on June 10, 2013 at 6:30pm in the [Startup Edmonton] [1] offices ([#301, 10359-104 St, Edmonton, AB] [6]).

Our [last meeting] [9] featured two talks (and about 30 people):

* Setting up and managing a Python environment - Part 1 by [Brian Forst] [7].
* Refactoring code using generators by [Aden Grue] [8].

## About Us

Inspired by the community we saw at PyCon, we hope to foster a strong, supportive, and proficient Python community in the Edmonton area.

We meet on the second Monday of each month to listen to presentations and discuss Python news and events. Anyone interested in any aspect of Python development is welcome to join.

## Past Presentations
Wherever possible, code and slides from past presentations is made available in our [GitHub repository] [2].

## Contact

You can contact us at info@EdmontonPy.com or follow us on [Twitter] [4], [Meetup.com] [9], or [Facebook] [5].

[1]: http://www.startupedmonton.com                  "Startup Edmonton"
[2]: http://EdmontonPy.com/presentations             "Edmonton.py Presentations"
[3]: https://www.facebook.com/events/148673168640825 "Next Meeting"
[4]: https://twitter.com/EdmontonPy                  "Edmonton.py on Twitter"
[5]: https://www.facebook.com/EdmontonPy             "Edmonton.py on Facebook"
[6]: http://maps.google.ca/maps?q=Startup+Edmonton,+10359+104+Street+Northwest,+Edmonton,+AB&hl=en&ll=53.545816,-113.499069&spn=0.042482,0.111151&sll=53.545816,-113.499069&sspn=0.042482,0.111151&hq=Startup+Edmonton,+10359+104+Street&hnear=Northwest+Edmonton,+Edmonton,+Division+No.+11,+Alberta&t=m&z=14 "Startup Edmonton Offices"
